title: 48: OBITCH easy, breezy, beautiful cemetery girl...
description:
Happy Thursday Geoffs! This week Madison is decoding some of the symbols found on headstones, then walk down the aisle with us as Spencer chats all things post-humous marriage, A.K.A. necrogamy. We’ve got an obituary for a socialite who decided to take a holier path, and one who wasn’t scared to tell others to ‘get a grip!’ Lastly, we of course have some dumb.ass.criminallllllls! 

SEE US LIVE IN IRVINE ON AUGUST 4TH: https://tinyurl.com/3fvwbsnz

Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807
Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast
Sponsors: 
Apostrophe: Save fifteen dollars off your first visit with an Apostrophe provider at apostrophe.com/obit when you use our code: ‘OBIT’.
Olive & June: Visit oliveandjune.com/obit for 20% off your first Mani System! 
Raycon: BuyRaycon.com/obit to get 15% off your Raycon order! 
Hello Fresh: Go to hellofresh.com/obit16 and use code ‘obit16’ for up to 16 free meals and 3 free gifts!

Sources:
https://www.livescience.com/63870-ashes-sugar-cookie.html https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/pilotonline/name/mary-broom-obituary?id=17327955 https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2087909/Grief-stricken-bridegroom-Chadil-Deffy-marries-DEAD-girlfriend-grim-Thai-ceremony.html https://www.heritagediscovered.com/blog/gravestone-symbols-meanings http://nabgg.org/archives/5-List-of-Gravestone-Symbols-and-Their-Meanings.html https://www.buygravemarkers.com/History_of_the_Granite_Gravemarker.php https://weburbanist.com/2015/10/28/the-language-of-death-15-gravestone-symbols-explained/3/ https://www.joincake.com/blog/gravestone-symbols/ https://familytreemagazine.com/cemeteries/hidden-meanings-gravestone-symbols/ https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/articles/326281 https://www.huckmag.com/art-and-culture/amanda-feilding-acid-psychedelic-research-drugs-pioneer/ https://chicago.suntimes.com/2021/6/8/22524613/ann-russell-miller-sister-mary-joseph-trinity-socialite-unusual-nun-discalced-carmelite https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/sfgate/name/mary-joseph-obituary?n=mary-joseph&pid=198930230 https://www.newsweek.com/car-crash-maine-portland-police-department-drink-driving-stuck-stairs-photos-1702506 https://www.thoughtco.com/photo-gallery-of-cemetery-symbolism-4123061 https://www.memorials.com/Headstone-History-information.php See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
